about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm currently a college student in my 2nd year of Bachelor's in Communication and Multimedia. I am acquainted with PHP, JavaScript, C# and C++. Technologies include Unity. This website has been created to get to know React!

projects.title: Projects
projects.snake: Snake clone built with C++ using SDL2. This was a huge milestone for me.
projects.klochon: Klochon is a Discord bot working in conjunction with an API I programmed. It will fetch GTA San Andreas files from a database for modding purposes.
projects.gta-api: This is the API working with Klochon. It was built with Express and JavaScript.
projects.resumos: College notes for students in Communication and Multimedia. They are written in Portuguese.
projects.online-shop: Marketplace built with PHP and Bootstrap 5. For a more detailed breakdown, find the git repo below.
